features.name: AI Chat Interface
features.description: Main chat interface component with message handling, file upload, and AI response generation with enhanced error handling

features.name: AI Chat API
features.description: Next.js API route for processing chat requests with Google Gemini AI integration and improved error handling

features.name: Health Check API
features.description: API endpoint to verify Google AI API key configuration and service health

features.name: Backend Server
features.description: Express.js server with PDF processing, Google AI integration, and Supabase connection

features.name: Rate Limiting Handler
features.description: Enhanced error handling for rate limiting, authentication, and network issues

features.name: Environment Configuration
features.description: Environment variable management for Google AI API keys and other configuration

features.name: UI Components
features.description: Reusable UI components built with Radix UI and Tailwind CSS

features.name: Document Processing
features.description: File upload and text extraction functionality for PDF, DOCX, TXT, and CSV files

features.name: Utility Functions
features.description: Common utility functions for class name merging and other helpers

features.name: Custom Hooks
features.description: React hooks for mobile detection, hydration safety, and toast notifications

features.name: Next.js Configuration
features.description: Turbopack and webpack configuration for Next.js 16 compatibility
